title: Penguin Highway
synopsis: For a child, Aoyama has knowledge comparable to an adult. As such, he is often teased by his classmates. He also has a crush on the friendly woman he recently met at a dental office. One morning, penguins start mysteriously appearing around his neighborhood. Nobody knows where they came from and how they managed to get there. Aoyama is determined to find out more, and he joins his new crush in researching the penguins.
voices: ['Aoi, Yuu', 'Kita, Kana', 'Kugimiya, Rie', 'Han, Megumi', 'Kuno, Misaki', 'Nishijima, Hidetoshi', 'Fukui, Miki', 'Noto, Mamiko', 'Takenaka, Naoto']
